body: A natural 1 (the d20 comes up 1) on an attack roll is always a miss. A natural 20 (the d20 comes up 20) is always a hit. A natural 20 is also a threat—a possible critical hit (see the attack action).
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Combat Statistics/Attack Roll/Automatic Misses and Hits
name: Automatic Misses and Hits
